author: Vincent Wood, Vincent Wood
title: 'Your clapping echoes through every hospital': NHS staff thank public in TV broadcast after UK erupts in applause for workers fighting coronavirus
description: Health workers thank country after public erupt in applause for fourth consecutive week
content:
NHS workers on the frontline of the battle against coronavirus have thanked the public for their support in a television message broadcast to mark the fourth weekly round of applause for those working in health and social care.
Across the past month, million… [+7006 chars]
